title: Is this even a laptop anymore? - XMG Ultra 17 Gaming Laptop
description: XMG claims this to be the fastest gaming laptop but with its size and power requirements should this be even considered a laptop anymore??  Check out the XMG Ultra 17 at   Buy iFixit ProTech ToolKit On Amazon (PAID LINK):      On NewEgg (PAID LINK):     On BestBuy (PAID LINK):   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
